definitions.definition: Any mollusc belonging to the taxonomic class Bivalvia , characterized by a shell consisting of two hinged sections, such as a scallop , clam , mussel or oyster .
A pericarp in which the seedcase opens or splits into two parts or valves .

main_definition: Any mollusc belonging to the taxonomic class Bivalvia , characterized by a shell consisting of two hinged sections, such as a scallop , clam , mussel or oyster .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) A pericarp in which the seedcase opens or splits into two parts or valves .
